---
title: "Knapsack Lexicase vs NSGA2"
output: html_document
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(plotly)


Knapsack.Data <- read.csv('E:/Drive_EdEdEd/Research/Pysh/KnapsackData.csv',
                          header = TRUE)

m <- list(
  size = 14, opacity = 0.7
)
f <- list(
  family = "Courier New, monospace",
  size = 18,
  color = "#000000"
)
x <- list(
  title = "Total Value in Knapsack",
  titlefont = f
)
y <- list(
  title = "Total weight in Knapsack",
  titlefont = f
)



p <- plot_ly(Knapsack.Data,
             x = Avg.Val,
             y = Avg.Weight,
             mode = "markers",
             color = Selection,
             colors = c("red", "blue"),
             marker = m) %>%
  layout(xaxis = x, yaxis = y)
```
```{r, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
p
```
